verbose_text: It was found that activation of epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR), fibroblast growth factor (FGFR), and platelet derived growth factor receptor (PDGFR) via phosphorylation leads to activation of STAT3, and a subsequent increase of the cell cycle [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: fibroblast growth factor (FGFR), and platelet-derived growth factor receptor (PDGFR) via phosphorylation leads to activation of STAT3, and a subsequent increase of the cell cycle
